content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, you want to negotiate the rental price. How much do you think is a fair price for this apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I think a fair price would be 1200 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit low for this type of apartment in the city center. I can go down to 1500 Euro.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think your offer is too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too low, how about 1550 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can meet you halfway, so 1500 Euro is the best I can do.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1500] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, let's make this deal official!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
